data.name: The Original Rhythm Knights Classic Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Every rhythm game needs it's soundtrack! Listen to the original soundtrack for Rhythm Knights composed by Jijigri and Dallen Larson.


Who is Dallen Larson?
Dallen Larson, born September 20, 2002, is a an American video game developer. He is best known for the hit indie rhythm game, Rhythm Knights.
